title: pAlayashu padmanAbha
sahitya:
pAlayashu padmanAbha nIla dEha pAlitEbha


anupallavi

  bAlakrSNa bhakta sulabha kAlanEmi hara su-shObha


caraNam    vAsudEva gAnalOla bhUsurAvanaika shIla bhAsamAna ratnamAla shrI samEta sarasa lIla
				(madhyamakAlam)
bhAsurAni nibha kuntala vAsavAdi vibudha pAla shAsitAkhilArijAla dAsa pArtha paripAla
